Components: Accordion

Accordion Heading

      </div>
      <div class="accordion__body collapse show" id="acc-1" data-parent="#accordionSample">
         <div class="more-space">
            <p>Content here...</p>
         </div>
      </div>
   </div><!-- /.accordion-wrapper -->

      </div>

         </div>
      </div>
   </div><!-- /.accordion-wrapper -->
